name: UpdateDialingPermissionsSettings
description: Update voice dialing permissions inheritance for the sub-account

DialingPermissionsInheritance.description: `true` for the sub-account to inherit voice dialing permissions from the Master Project; otherwise `false`.

$ul: **dialing_permissions_inheritance**: `true` if the sub-account will inherit voice dialing permissions from the Master Project; otherwise `false`.
**url**: The absolute URL of this resource.
